About

About

Hi.

I’m Jennette. Some people call me j.net.

When I’m not reading, which is bordering on obsessive, see Exhibit A, I like to tinker with various things. Most commonly I spend time crocheting like the rockin’ granny I aspire to be, Exhibit B. but lately I’ve been diving face-first into the world of mechanical keyboards. The actual act of building my first keyboard was much for fun than I thought would be, and I wanted somewhere to share a bit of my adventures and of course, pictures.

This is that somehwere, let’s call it: Exhibit C.

#Exhibit A
